200.description: Active BTC staking transactions retrieved successfully.

code.description: Code indicating the success of the operation.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

stakedBTCTxList.description: List of active BTC staking transactions.

candidateAddress.description: The address of the candidate for the staking transaction.

btcAddress.description: The BTC address associated with the staking transaction.

btcTXId.description: The transaction ID of the BTC staking.

confirmedTxHash.description: The hash of the confirmed BTC transaction.

script.description: The script associated with the staking transaction.

startRound.description: The round when the staking transaction started.

endRound.description: The round when the staking transaction ends.

delegateRound.description: The round when the staking was delegated.

outputIndex.description: The index of the output in the BTC transaction.

rewardAddress.description: The address to receive rewards from the staking transaction.

unlockTime.description: The unlock time for the BTC staking transaction.

redeemAddress.description: The address to redeem BTC from the staking transaction.

pkHash.description: Public key hash associated with the BTC address.

status.description: Integer indicating the status of the stake.

stakedBTCAmount.description: Total amount of BTC currently staked.

400.description: Invalid BTC address or public key hash supplied.
